resources.string: The simple act of coloring will allow you to focus on a positive and creative activity, while at the same time diverting your mind’s focus on stress. To color the images, select the color corresponding to each number on the color bar, and then tap to fill in each numbered area in the drawing.

This mini game is designed to distract you from your anxieties and worries. When the game begins, tap the squares that light up until the song ends. Careful- If you do not tap the correct tile, the game will end!

Music has the powerful ability to distract and settle the mind. Uplifting music helps divert focus on anxiety, while relaxing music settles and calms the mind. Select the buttons with the type of music you’d like to hear.
Meditation has been found to be extremely useful in reducing stress and anxiety. Use the slide bar to indicate your current stress level, and follow along with the meditation provided.
